attributes.action: Bring back Spitting Image (the satirical puppet TV show)
attributes.additional_details:
There's no better time to bring the show back to the world.  Everything's gone mad, and the only way to make sense of the new world order, post-Brexit, post-Trump, post-Intelligence is to take the mick out of everyone with equal fervour.

Spitting Image helped us understand our world, but pointing out how ridiculous it all was.

We need an anchor in the storm.
We need safe harbour.
We need guidance.

We need Spitting Image.
attributes.background:
In the current age, frankly, the world has gone crazy.  It's no longer possible to determine farce from fact or satire from reality.  We need a new baseline.  We need a champion for social change.

Spitting Image dealt with everyone equally, everyone knew where they stood.  We need it back.  Now.
